entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chambly
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
